title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Case-Based Instructional Design for Improving Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming concepts and experience in logical problem-solving
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can apply the four stages of computational thinking (CT) - decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, and algorithm design - by analyzing real-world cases
Learners can document problem-solving processes using CT elements and systematically share them on an LMS
Teams can implement creative solutions based on computational thinking with over 80% completion in project-based learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
